attributes.action: press for the return to the TalkSpot airwaves of Mr. James Whale after he was sacked for suggesting Londoners should vote for Boris Johnston on air.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
James Whale was an outspoken, but highly respected TalkSport radio presenter who was sacked by the station for encourging the people of London to vote for Boris Johnston in the recent Mayoral elections in London.  

I do not always agree with Mr. Whales opinions, but respect the fact that he says what he thinks and cares passionately about Britain and the honest people who reside within.

I think therefore that Mr. Brown should press for TalkSport to reinstate him.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
